room_title: Escape room "The Passage" by Twisted Limits Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: I have done over 15 Escape Rooms and nothing is even close to the Twisted Limits ones. The 90 minute escape room called The Passage is definitely the best. Congrats to owners Keith and Joe on such an awesome sincere experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Passage" by Twisted Limits Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: I had heard about these places but was totally impressed. Very professional staff and helpful to a newbie. I highly recommend trying this with a group of friends or strangers.

room_title: Escape room "The Passage" by Twisted Limits Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: It is so much fun. The owners make it a blast from the moment you walk in! The rooms are amazing, especially The Passage! Very challenging but not overly so. My family's favorite place!
